import React from "react"; // ICONS import { FaPowerOff } from "react-icons/fa"; import { BsFillPersonFill, BsFillFolderFill, BsPower } from "react-icons/bs"; import { HiChevronRight } from "react-icons/hi"; import { AiFillWallet, AiTwotoneContainer } from "react-icons/ai"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; //REDUX import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; export default function UserMenu() { const state = useSelector((state) => state.AuthProvider); const userData = state.user; const history = useHistory(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleLogout = () => { dispatch({ type: "LOGOUT", }); // history.go(0); history.push("/"); }; // const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (
{/* USER IMAGE */}
Hello,
{userData?.customerName}
My orders
Account Details
Profile Information
Manage Address
PAN Card Information
Payments
Saved UPI
Saved Cards
My Stuff
My Review & Ratings
My Wishlist

Content
); }
